explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor environment, a hill covered with lush green trees can be seen in the distance, with messy grass growing at the foot of the hill. A woman is standing on the hardened ground, holding the handlebars of a standing motorcycle. She is wearing a black sleeveless top, blue jeans, and black shoes. She is also wearing a black and blue helmet. Her black motorcycle is very cool, with green stripes on the side and the word "daly" on the front side. The construction of the standing motorcycle is unobstructed, and the thick and long exhaust pipe at the bottom is very eye-catching.
